## IConversationStore interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IConversationStore extends IStore<IConversation> 
```
```typescript
export declare namespace IConversationStore 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addMember(conversationId, userId, init)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.addmember.md) | Add a member to a conversation<!-- -->The current user must be a member of the conversation to be able to add another member, and unless the <code>membersCanAddUsers</code> setting is true, the current user must also be an owner. |
|  [createGroupChat(members)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.creategroupchat.md) | Create a new group chat<!-- -->The initial members will be the current user and all users given in the <code>members</code> argument. |
|  [createIM(userId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.createim.md) | Create a one to one chat with another user<!-- -->If an IM conversation with the given user already exists, that same conversation will be returned |
|  [createRoom(name, description, members, settings)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.createroom.md) | Create a new room<!-- -->The initial members will be the current user and all users given in the <code>members</code> aegument. |
|  [getConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.getconversation.md) | Get a conversation<!-- -->Only conversations that are public, or that the acting user is a member of, are available. So even if the specified conversation ID actually exists, this method will fail with [ConversationNotFound](./core-conversations.conversationnotfound.md) if the conversation is not available to the acting user. |
|  [getConversations()](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.getconversations.md) | Gets all conversations that the acting user is a member of<!-- -->The returned array of conversations will be sorted according to the time the latest message in the conversation is sent, in descending order. Conversations without any messages will be sorted after conversations that do. |
|  [getMember(conversationId, userId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.getmember.md) | Get member information |
|  [getMembers(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.getmembers.md) | Get members of a conversation |
|  [hideConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.hideconversation.md) | Hide a conversation |
|  [joinConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.joinconversation.md) | Join a conversation<!-- -->The conversation must be a public room. |
|  [leaveConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.leaveconversation.md) |  |
|  [muteConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.muteconversation.md) | Mute a conversation<!-- -->All notifications for incoming messages will be muted. |
|  [unhideConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.unhideconversation.md) | Unhide a conversation |
|  [unmuteConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.unmuteconversation.md) | Unute a conversation<!-- -->All notifications for incoming messages will be unmuted. |
|  [updateConversation(conversationId, settings)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.updateconversation.md) | Update the settings of a conversation. |
|  [updateMember(conversationId, userId, update)](./core-conversations.iconversationstore.updatemember.md) | Update a member of a conversation<!-- -->This can be used for example to promote a member to an owner, or to demote an owner to a regular member. |
